source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 787,541 damage to your primary target and 140,030 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to bring the candle to life, summoning a waxen ally to light up your enemies.

Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 41,497 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 124,493 Nature Damage instead.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 409,431 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
